summary.value: I promise you, my bedside manner is excellent

system.description:
PHYSICIAN

ALSO: Hospitalier, Medic, Nurse

Physicians are professionals at the healing arts. Their deft and steady hands are well suited to various mundane medical procedures, from dressing wounds to ameliorating even the worst of maladies.

Beyond the medical arts, Physicians also possess uncanny precision, whether it be for packing as many medical supplies as they can or wielding weapons with deadly accuracy.

PHYSICIAN FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

PHYSICIAN SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.wK7vLSqzAc18YJVc]{Doctorate}

You may perform Medical Procedures (see next page).

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.shDIeaOHgvXlEI8A]{Drug Synthesis} (SL3)

When you create a potion, you may combine that item with up to 【SL】 number of Pharmaceuticals before using it. The resulting potion combines all the component items' effects and IP costs, and may have synergy effects depending on the combination.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.ynC07YVeGT35RyKl]{Emergency Aid} (SL5)

When you use an item or cast a spell that restores HP and/or MP, your target recovers an additional 【SL × 5】 HP and/or MP if they are in Crisis.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Jh95dD6UU2BYvK8a]{Organized Pharmacy} (SL3)

You may carry an additional 【SL × 2】 Inventory Points. You can only use these additional Inventory Points for Pharmaceuticals and items made using the Drug Synthesis Skill.

If you take this Skill during character creation, you begin play with the additional IP.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.pLb2shfrtJpF9eNQ]{Pharmaceuticals} (SL5)

Each time you acquire this Skill, you stock two new kinds of Pharmaceutical (see page 4).
